entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
